definition: a handle/to pull on a handle
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Hand in hand, have no quarrel.
sentences.chinese: 他们手拉手，不吵也不闹。

sentences.english: Linear door handle and auto-return to open, humanistic design.
sentences.chinese: 直线式门拉手和开门自动回归，设计更具人性化。

sentences.english: They sat down, hand in hand.
sentences.chinese: 他们手拉手地坐了下来。

sentences.english: And for this, hand-in-hand will work better than fist-to-fist.
sentences.chinese: 为此目的，手拉手比拳对拳要奏效。

sentences.english: But in days to come he will walk hand in hand with us.
sentences.chinese: 但是在未来的日子里，他会跟我们手拉手地一起走的。

sentences.english: I remember those dark streets and walking hand in hand with my father.
sentences.chinese: 我记得那些黑暗的街道以及同父亲手拉手走路的情景。

sentences.english: Celine and the girl sang one of her hit song together hand in hand , looking into each other's eyes deeply.
sentences.chinese: 席琳迪翁和女孩手拉手，共同演唱了她的一首成名曲。

sentences.english: They walked down the street hand in hand.
sentences.chinese: 他们手拉手沿街道走去。

sentences.english: The plush cat carrier is yellow and blue with a grey carrying handle and door.
sentences.chinese: 毛绒猫咪便携箱为黄色和蓝色，拉手和门为灰色。

sentences.english: Determination went hand in hand with doggedness.
sentences.chinese: 决心手拉手与顽固状态匹配。

sentences.english: His third reach was all instinct.
sentences.chinese: 他的手第三次接触弹射拉手，靠的完全是一种本能。

sentences.english: The marketing system for your MLM business works hand in hand with your MLM recruiting system.
sentences.chinese: 您传销业务营销体系工程手拉手阁下传销招聘制。

sentences.english: Standard and moulded handgrips are available.
Use the handles on drawers and doors so you do not smash your fingers.
sentences.chinese: 用抽屉上的拉手来打开抽屉，以防夹到手指。

sentences.english: These often go hand-in-hand with negativity.
sentences.chinese: 这种关系经常会与消极与手拉手相伴出现的。

sentences.english: In the game any backing or barging from behind is strictly out.
sentences.chinese: 比赛中任何拉手或撞人犯规都是绝对不允许的。

definition: to help lift up onto one's shoulders/to stand on sb's shoulder
ring pull (can)/strap handle (on bus or train)/circular door handle
